channel.title: Execution window
channel.description:
there's lots of things released such as: user control panels, tool bars etcetera. i kind of liked the idea but it was mainly server-sided and wasn't very adaptable. therefore, i've made it based upon the client. if the cache hasn't been downloaded, a button 'download cache' will appear - to obviously download the servers cache. if the cache already exists - two buttons will appear, 'play now' and 'vote now'. play now - running the client. vote now - opening an external URL to where ever. [b]the client will not start unless you click either 'Download cache' or 'Play now'[/b] lastly, the window is a bit ugly so i'll be changing it.
here's what it has so far:
[ul][li]reads the cache, if the cache is in the user area: play now button will appear[/li] [li]if cache isn't user area and the player clicks 'download cache' it will download the cache[/li] [li]menu bars and sub-menu bars[/li] [li]using Java's built in colour chooser, i've implemented it with the JFrame so you customize the theme of your client.[/li][/ul]
a lot more coming soon.
images: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/4/cdp1.png/][IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/7793/cdp1.png[/img][/URL] [b]berry being the cache.[/b] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/191/63p3.png/][IMG]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/3416/63p3.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/69/htec.png/][IMG]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/2821/htec.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/594/dhfc.png/][IMG]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/6509/dhfc.png[/img][/URL]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2kFXvByxNn8
i know this isn't hard, you don't have to remind me.

item.title: Execution window
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

there’s lots of things released such as: user control panels, tool bars etcetera. i kind of liked the idea but it was mainly server-sided and wasn’t very adaptable. therefore, i’ve made it based upon the client. if the cache hasn’t been downloaded, a button ‘download cache’ will appear - to obviously download the servers cache. if the cache already exists - two buttons will appear, ‘play now’ and ‘vote now’. play now - running the client. vote now - opening an external URL to where ever.
the client will not start unless you click either ‘Download cache’ or ‘Play now’
lastly, the window is a bit ugly so i’ll be changing it.

here’s what it has so far:

[ul][li]reads the cache, if the cache is in the user area: play now button will appear[/li]
[li]if cache isn’t user area and the player clicks ‘download cache’ it will download the cache[/li]
[li]menu bars and sub-menu bars[/li]
[li]using Java’s built in colour chooser, i’ve implemented it with the JFrame so you customize the theme of your client.[/li][/ul]

a lot more coming soon.

images:

berry being the cache.


i know this isn’t hard, you don’t have to remind me.
